name: Puzzle for Kids and Toddlers: Vehicles Jigsaw
name_original: Puzzle for Kids and Toddlers: Vehicles Jigsaw
description:
A fun and interactive jigsaw puzzle game that will keep your child learning for hours on any smartphone or tablet device.

It’s just like putting together a puzzle but you’ll never have to worry about missing pieces!

Recommended for children 2-4 years of age, the game play was designed to encourage spatial recognition by solving simple animated jigsaw puzzles.

Colorful images in every puzzle, categorized by themes, such as cars, animal, and food, for intuitive learning.



Key Features:

- A big collection of puzzles for hours of gameplay. Themes and pictures are planned to increase!

- Intuitive user interface and touch control

- Animated images and sound

- Bonus balloon popping round at the end of each puzzle

- In game achievements are displayed on a personalized prize shelf


Try the game for free!

Full version with new and updated puzzles can be downloaded within the app. To safeguard against accidental in-app purchases, the user must correctly solve a skill testing math problem to proceed.

Game Play

Based on children’s game play analysis, interface and touch controls are specially designed for preschool children. To make it easier for them to assemble pieces the game offers several ways of doing a puzzle. We took special care of little kids: they have a chance to restore a puzzle picture because pieces stick to the right place in case they are just dragged there.
